---
title: Records
---

Record operations create, extract or manipulate Timestreams of records.


| Method                                           | Description                                                           |
|--------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [Timestream.col](`kaskada.Timestream.col`)       | Return a Timestream accessing the named column or field of `self`.    |
| [Timestream.select](`kaskada.Timestream.select`) | Return a Timestream selecting the given fields from `self`.           |
| [Timestream.remove](`kaskada.Timestream.remove`) | Return a Timestream removing the given fields from `self`.            |
| [Timestream.extend](`kaskada.Timestream.extend`) | Return a Timestream containing fields from `self` and `fields`.       |
| [Timestream.record](`kaskada.Timestream.record`) | Return a record Timestream from fields computed from this timestream. |
| [record](`kaskada.record`)                       | Return a record Timestream from the given fields.                     |
